com.dermalog.hardware.cardreader

Class CommandApdu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dermalog.hardware.cardreader.CommandApdu

  • public class CommandApdu
extends Object
    Wrapper around raw byte[] APDUs. Constructors represent the four cases of ISO 7816-4 Annex A

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandApdu(byte[] apdu)
      Constructor case independent
      CommandApdu(int cla, int ins, int p1, int p2)
      Constructor for case 1 APDU
      CommandApdu(int cla, int ins, int p1, int p2, byte[] data)
      Constructor for cas 3 APDU
      CommandApdu(int cla, int ins, int p1, int p2, byte[] data, int ne)
      Constructor for cas 4 APDU
      CommandApdu(int cla, int ins, int p1, int p2, int ne)
      Constructor for case 2 APDU

    • Method Summary

      Get raw byte representation of APDU

                   int ins,

        cla - CLA Byte
        ins - INS Byte
        p1 - P1 Byte
        p2 - P2 Byte
        data - Raw data (LC will be calculated automatically)

        p1 - P1 Byte
        p2 - P2 Byte
        data - Raw data (LC will be calculated automatically)
        ne - NE Byte (expected length of response)
